name: Aeroclub Ushuaia
about: Aeroclub Ushuaia, the southernmost flying school in the world, has been providing excellent service in aviation for over 60 years. Located in Ushuaia, Tierra del Fuego, Argentina, our flight school offers a range of services from baptism flights to advanced pilot training. We provide Private Pilot courses, Commercial Pilot licenses, and Flight Instructor certifications, all issued by Argentina's national aviation authority, ANAC. Our highly trained instructors and modern facilities, including the use of advanced flight simulators, ensure a comprehensive and safe learning environment. Whether you aim to become a professional pilot or fly as a hobby, Aeroclub Ushuaia is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
